name: Flight Mania
description:
Get ready to fight the enemy!

In Flight Mania, you play as pilot, on a mission to shoot down as many enemy planes as you can.

Controls, wasd, for moving up, down and roll left and right. Left Crtl to slow down and Left click to shoot, and Esc to exit the game.

The Game is made in under 48 hours, but not all the assets are created by me.
